remarks.para: May be inoperative provided the APU is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional deferral required – Auxiliary Power Unit (APU).
An auto-generated ACARS message requesting an inflight APU start should be disregarded.

placard.para: Placard ENG/APU/FIRE/OVHT Test Switch "APU FIRE DET INOP" as appropriate and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
